title: 'Heartbroken' South Dakota girl meets with Obama - CNN Video
text: 'Heartbroken' South Dakota girl meets with Obama Source: CNN Added on 2209 GMT (0509 HKT) May 11, 2015 JUST WATCHED More Videos ... MUST WATCH Rebecca Kelley wrote a letter to President Obama saying she was heartbroken he hadn't visited her state. That all changed minutes after Obama landed in Watertown, South Dakota. Videos You Should Watch (67)
